name: Ben and the Devil
description:
Ben and the Devil is a short visual novel based on a play I wrote for a playwriting class. Instead of letting it collect virtual dust in the abyss of my computer I decided to give it a couple new endings and turn it into a game. And now it's available for you to play. Huzzah?

Synopsis:

Being unable to cope with the loss of his daughter, Ben desperately seeks out a way to bring her back from the dead. This search leads him to the devil who promises Ben that he'll bring his daughter back if and only if Ben can win a game consisting of three trials. Whether or not Ben can complete the trials is completely up to you.

Features:

- 3,500+ words

- 3 endings

- It's free (You can pay for it if that's how you roll though)
